title: Development of 6 Milk Processing Centers
decision_details: - The Government has focused its attention towards the development of 06 milk processing centers with the objective of promoting the dairy industry. As such, the proposal made by Hon. Vijith Vijayamuni Zoysa, the Minister of Fisheries & Aquatic Resources Development and Rural Economic Affairs, to enter into an agreement with Boccard of France to develop 06 milk processing centers under a loan facility from the French Investment Bank, Netixis, was approved by the Cabinet.
